title: Looking for Co-founders in AI Space
description: We're building an AI-powered platform for **automated content generation** and looking for co-founders with experience in: * Machine Learning * Full-stack Development * Product Management Our MVP is ready and we have initial traction. Let's connect!

replies.text: This sounds amazing! I'm interested in the Machine Learning part.
We have experience in product management and would love to collaborate.

title: Cybersecurity Best Practices for Startups
description:
Sharing our experience with implementing security measures:

2. Regular security audits
3. Employee training programs
